name: Submerged Mountain
description: A mountain that has been covered by rising waters creates unique underwater environments and potential access to ancient ruins. The underwater environment creates unique exploration challenges, while the preserved structures can contain valuable artifacts or dangerous creatures.
atmosphere: Ancient mountain peak rises from the ocean floor while marine growth covers weathered stone surfaces. Preserved structures hint at civilizations lost to rising seas as schools of fish navigate the underwater landscape. Cold currents carry ancient secrets. Archaeological treasure buried beneath the waves.
